scenario: The modular data centers market is forecasted to grow by USD 42.56 billion during 2023-2028, accelerating at a CAGR of 19.8%. This growth is driven by the implementation of software-defined modular data centers, reducing complexity of traditional data centers, rapid deployment, and growing data economy globally. Key vendors in the market include Amazon.com Inc., Cisco Systems Inc., Dell Technologies Inc., and Schneider Electric SE. Cisco Systems Inc. is one of the leading vendors in the modular data centers market. The market is expected to be driven by the requirement to reduce complexity of traditional data centers, rapid deployment of modular data centers, and growing data economy globally. The report provides a comprehensive analysis of the market, including market size and forecast, trends, growth drivers, and challenges, as well as vendor analysis covering around 25 vendors.
